statements: UPDATE music_merchandise_inventory SET item_name = 'Guitar', item_price = 799.99 WHERE item_id = 101;
UPDATE music_merchandise_inventory SET quantity_in_stock = 50, item_category = 'Accessories' WHERE item_id = 102;
UPDATE music_merchandise_inventory SET item_price = 25.99, quantity_in_stock = quantity_in_stock - 1 WHERE item_id = 101
UPDATE music_merchandise_inventory SET item_name = 'New T-Shirt Design', item_category = 'Apparel' WHERE item_id = 201
UPDATE MusicMerchandiseInventory SET quantity = 20 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE StockLevels SET last_updated = '2023-01-30 12:45:00' WHERE product_id = 3;
UPDATE MusicMerchandiseInventory SET quantity = quantity + 10, price = 15.99 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE StockLevels SET stock_quantity = stock_quantity - 5, last_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE product_id = 5;
UPDATE Merchandise SET price = 15.99, stock_level = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com', address = '123 New Street' WHERE customer_id = 5;
UPDATE Merchandise SET price = 100.50, stock_level = 50 WHERE id = 101
UPDATE Orders SET total_amount = 200.75, order_date = '2022-03-15 12:00:00' WHERE order_id = 201
UPDATE MusicAlbums SET price = 19.99 WHERE album_name = 'Thriller'
UPDATE CustomerDetails SET email = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '1234567890' WHERE customer_id = 101
UPDATE MusicAlbums SET price = 15.99, release_date = '2022-05-20' WHERE album_id = 101
UPDATE MerchandiseItems SET stock_level = 50, price = 29.99 WHERE item_id = 201
UPDATE Merchandise SET stock_level = 100, price = 15.99 WHERE merchandise_id = 1;
UPDATE Merchandise SET price = 20.50, stock_level = 75 WHERE merchandise_id = 2;
UPDATE Merchandise SET stock_level = stock_level - 5, price = 10.99 WHERE merchandise_id = 101;
UPDATE Customers SET address = '123 Main Street', email = 'customer@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 201;
